text: NSB Class XXI is a steam locomotive class designed by the Norwegian State Railways exclusively for use on the Setesdal Line. ==External links== * Entry at Norwegian Railway Club thumb|left|Heritage locomotive on the Setesdal Line Category:2-6-2T locomotives Class N21 Category:DÃ¼bs locomotives Category:Thune locomotives Category:Steam locomotives of Norway Category:Railway locomotives introduced in 1894 Category:3 ft 6 in gauge locomotives
title: NSB Class XXI
